Staked(address,bytes32,address,uint256,u.details: emitted when user stakes an asset

params.amount: of the asset that was staked

Unstaked(address,bytes32,address,uint256.details: emitted when user unstakes an asset

params.amount: of the asset that was unstaked

amount of PNG_AVAX_USDCe_LP to be staked*

stakePngUsdceAvaxLpBeefy(uint256).notice: Stakes PNG_AVAX_USDCe_LP in the Beefy protocol

stakeTjUsdcAvaxLpBeefy(uint256).notice: Stakes TJ_WAVAX_USDC_LP in the Beefy protocol

unstakePngUsdcAvaxLpBeefy(uint256).notice: Unstakes PNG_WAVAX_USDC_LP from the Beefy protocol

unstakePngUsdceAvaxLpBeefy(uint256).notice: Unstakes PNG_AVAX_USDCe_LP from the Beefy protocol

unstakeTjUsdcAvaxLpBeefy(uint256).notice: Untakes TJ_WAVAX_USDC_LP from the Beefy protocol
